I had a great-aunt who was a mudang (Korean word for an exorcist).  It ws pretty crazy from what my mother told me -- and it involves chanting and a lot of other noisy activities.

Not sure that helps all that much - but here's an amusing tale that appears in "Chinese Fairy Tales & Fantasies" by Moss Roberts.
"The truth about ghosts"

"What is it about men that could frighten a ghost?" asked Ch'en.
"Saliva."
